bibl.title: A Qurānic Amulet on Papyrus: P. Utah. Ar. 342.
Documents and the History of the Early Islamic World

bibl.note: It contains all of Sūrat al-Ikhlāṣ (Q 112) and Sūrat al-Falaq (Q 113), most of Sūrat al-Nās (Q 114), and the first thirteen verses of Sūrat Yā'Sīn (Q 36). The four sūras are parts of prayers and rituals for the sick, dying, and deed.
